text: Petros G. Molyviatis (12 June 1928 â€“ 4 May 2025) was a Greek politician. He was the Minister for Foreign Affairs three times from 2004 to 2006, May to June 2012, and August to September 2015.Remarks With Greek Foreign Minister Petros Molyviatis After Meeting. U.S. Department of State, 24 March 2005. Retrieved 14 September 2011. Molyviatis died on 4 May 2025 at a hospital in Athens, Greece from problems caused by respiratory failure at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Foreign ministers of Greece Category:Deaths from respiratory failure
title: Petros Molyviatis
